body:
Can you tell me when those strings are used, so I can view them in context? They are presented for translation in Weblate and therefore translated.

- [Dialog](/TokTok/qTox/blob/6d6d83eed68c2c5b740c60938141582894939582/translations/bg.ts#L200) → [aboutfriendform.ui#L14](https://github.com/TokTok/qTox/blob/6d6d83eed68c2c5b740c60938141582894939582/src/widget/about/aboutfriendform.ui#L14)
- [username](/TokTok/qTox/blob/6d6d83eed68c2c5b740c60938141582894939582/translations/bg.ts#L204) → [aboutfriendform.ui#L26](/TokTok/qTox/blob/6d6d83eed68c2c5b740c60938141582894939582/src/widget/about/aboutfriendform.ui#L26)
- [status message](/TokTok/qTox/blob/6d6d83eed68c2c5b740c60938141582894939582/translations/bg.ts#L208) → [aboutfriendform.ui#L51](/TokTok/qTox/blob/6d6d83eed68c2c5b740c60938141582894939582/src/widget/about/aboutfriendform.ui#L51)
- [Used aliases:](/TokTok/qTox/blob/6d6d83eed68c2c5b740c60938141582894939582/translations/bg.ts#L212) → [aboutfriendform.ui#L156](/TokTok/qTox/blob/6d6d83eed68c2c5b740c60938141582894939582/src/widget/about/aboutfriendform.ui#L156)
- [HISTORY OF ALIASES](/TokTok/qTox/blob/6d6d83eed68c2c5b740c60938141582894939582/translations/bg.ts#L216) → [aboutfriendform.ui#L163](/TokTok/qTox/blob/6d6d83eed68c2c5b740c60938141582894939582/src/widget/about/aboutfriendform.ui#L163)

comment_data.body:
* "Used aliases:" and "HISTORY OF ALIASES" seems to be an unimplemented feature. I'm removing the strings for now.
* "username" and "status message" are always immediately overwritten by the actual username and status message. I'm marking them as untranslatable.
* Dialog is also overwritten by the username.

None of these are real. I'm removing them all now.

Thanks for your work on the translations! I've removed the useless strings: https://github.com/TokTok/qTox/pull/498. If there are any more, please let me know and I'll remove them (or if they are real, I'll make a screenshot where they appear).

Thank you very much for your prompt response and timely action! I truly appreciate the care you put into this project. I can confidently continue to refine the translation and having your support will only make qTox not only better for its users but for its translators.

Can you give me some pointers (if any) on how to distinguish between used and unused/overwritten strings (if any)? The strings in the OP are simply missing from the UI, and this form is very simple, without much happening behind the scenes. I was fairly confident that those strings were unused.

Sometimes it's hard to tell. I've been changing unused/replaced strings with `{{string}}` in the UI files, but the old code isn't necessarily so clear. What I did was:

1. Open the .ui file in Qt Creator
2. See where those strings appear
3. Compare to my running qTox
4. Observe that they don't appear and/or are replaced

Then I found the name of the UI element for "HISTORY OF ALIASES", which was "aliases", and looked in the advancedform.cpp file. In there, I only found `aliases->hide()`, nothing else, so it was unused.
Will follow your advice and in case of doubt will post here if you don't mind.

```
tr("Sets IPv6 <on>/<off>. Default is ON.")
tr("Sets UDP <on>/<off>. Default is ON.")
tr("Sets LAN discovery <on>/<off>. UDP off overrides. Default is ON.")
tr("Sets proxy settings. Default is NONE.")
```
I guess `<on>/<off>`, `ON` and `NONE` here should not be translated.
That's correct. I should add a context to that to make it clear.

Another one that should be `notr`
[Form](/TokTok/qTox/blob/14cc6628e973c06fbfc71c8123c4b0e59497692a/src/chatlog/content/filetransferwidget.ui#L14)

Probably one of them should be merged
- `Choose an auto-accept directory`: [[1]](/TokTok/qTox/blob/14cc6628e973c06fbfc71c8123c4b0e59497692a/src/widget/about/aboutfriendform.cpp#L21)
- `Choose an auto accept directory`: [[1]](/TokTok/qTox/blob/14cc6628e973c06fbfc71c8123c4b0e59497692a/src/widget/friendwidget.cpp#L270), [[2]](/TokTok/qTox/blob/14cc6628e973c06fbfc71c8123c4b0e59497692a/src/widget/form/settings/generalform.cpp#L316)
Good catch. I've unified them here: https://github.com/TokTok/qTox/pull/505

Probably `notr`
> [...](/TokTok/qTox/blob/32a3294a5c49ef32aa0378040195e7eed70d33ab/src/mainwindow.ui#L788)

Probably mergeable
> [Couldn't load profile](/TokTok/qTox/blob/32a3294a5c49ef32aa0378040195e7eed70d33ab/src/widget/loginscreen.cpp#L202)
> [Couldn't load this profile](/TokTok/qTox/blob/32a3294a5c49ef32aa0378040195e7eed70d33ab/src/widget/loginscreen.cpp#L209)

> [Set your status message that will be shown to others](/TokTok/qTox/blob/32a3294a5c49ef32aa0378040195e7eed70d33ab/src/mainwindow.ui#L664)
> [Status message visible to contacts](/TokTok/qTox/blob/57c3520100fbe83ff5f9cced40870ceda783913c/src/widget/form/profileform.ui#L182)

> You do not have permission to write that location. Choose another, or cancel the save dialog.
> You do not have permission to write to that location. Choose another, or cancel the save dialog.

> Set your password
> Set profile password

> Smileys
> Emoticons

> ` px` - with leading space
> `px` - w/o leading space


IMO, the following two elements are problematic because the important information is hidden in the tooltip instead of being immediately visible to the user. The first element is the label of an input field, and the second is the tooltip of a button next to the said input. It might be wise to replace the label content with the tooltip content and remove the tooltip altogether, as it will no longer serve any purpose. Take this suggestion with a grain of salt, as I'm not a UX expert.
> [NoSpam is part of your Tox ID. If you are being spammed with friend requests, you should change your NoSpam.](/TokTok/qTox/blob/63eb1f02166ed00fff290138addd3e3c6a8e5407/src/widget/form/settings/privacysettings.ui#L78)
> [NoSpam is a part of your ID that can be changed at will. If you are getting spammed with friend requests, change the NoSpam.](/TokTok/qTox/blob/63eb1f02166ed00fff290138addd3e3c6a8e5407/src/widget/form/settings/privacysettings.ui#L89)

I need clarification of this string as it isn't immediately clear.
`Couldn't change database password, it may be corrupted or use the old password.`
My guess: "use old password" should be read as "You are attempting to change the password by entering the one that is already in use.".

[Transmitting](/TokTok/qTox/blob/30ea2f81ab4da55c2ad124b0b0afeabd097644e8/src/widget/form/filesform.cpp#L63) - it is 'transfer' in the other places or is it status for outgoing transfers? I'm not entirely sure about this one.

loginscreen.ui (`<widget class="PasswordEdit" name="loginPassword">`) could use the `accessibleDescription` of setpassworddialog.ui (`<widget class="PasswordEdit" name="passwordlineEdit">`)

Edit: what format of the toxURI is accepted by the application from the command line? I'm unable to make in accept `?message` or don't know how to send it in. It seems to only accept `tox:361C7810EBEC6EE1A845C64C1EB7374DE9DDCF8458082921E8FE4B81AE56444DBCE9C6A8E8A7` and not
- `361C7810EBEC6EE1A845C64C1EB7374DE9DDCF8458082921E8FE4B81AE56444DBCE9C6A8E8A7`
- `tox:361C7810EBEC6EE1A845C64C1EB7374DE9DDCF8458082921E8FE4B81AE56444DBCE9C6A8E8A7?name=JohnDoe`
- `tox:361C7810EBEC6EE1A845C64C1EB7374DE9DDCF8458082921E8FE4B81AE56444DBCE9C6A8E8A7?message=Hello`
- `tox:361C7810EBEC6EE1A845C64C1EB7374DE9DDCF8458082921E8FE4B81AE56444DBCE9C6A8E8A7?name=JohnDoe&message=Hello`

Which is probably expected.
Thanks, these are all very useful pieces of feedback. I'm on the road now, I'll look into answering your questions soon and I'll make the merges and notr changes.

labels.description: Bug fix for the user, not a fix to a build script
labels.name: bug

title: Question about translation strings
